channel.title: Error when trying to run server
channel.description:
I downloaded a new source, and i get this error when i try to run it:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/errorrun.png[/img]
here is the code for my run.bat: [code]@echo off title 2006 remake "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath bin server.Server release nogui pause exit [/code]
How do i fix, and what's going on?

item.title: Error when trying to run server
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

i guess its pi, just get the file called definitions.cfg from other pi, wich can be found in the items folder (\config\items)

hope it works

Read full topic
item.source: Error when trying to run server

item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Go to Config > items, loook for definitions.cfg does this file exist?
